tool_description: Validates items in cart before checkout, checking availability, pricing, shipping restrictions, and payment compatibility.

payment_method.description: Payment method to validate: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, apple_pay, google_pay

error_messages: Empty cart: No items in cart to validate for checkout.
Invalid payment method: Use one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, apple_pay, google_pay].
Shipping restrictions: Some items cannot be shipped to the specified country.
Price changes detected: Item prices have changed since adding to cart.
Stock unavailable: Some items are no longer available in the requested quantities.
usage: Provide user_id and shipping_address_country to validate cart items. Optionally specify payment_method to check payment compatibility with cart items.

invalid_items.description: Array of item IDs that failed validation

validation_errors.description: Array of error messages for invalid items

estimated_total.description: Estimated total amount for valid items

shipping_available.description: Whether shipping is available to the specified address
